title: Unspecified Error
body:
Hi I have been having this problem for about a month. Whenever i would patch the game it would send a message on the unspecified error at around 70%.

Then, I upgraded the client. the game patched but the new client will bring up an unspecified error message at around 1%.

I looked all over the internet for solutions: 

I tried the hextech repair tool
tried a different, better connection
deleted the air client and repatched
I tried reinstalled the game
debugged my laptop and fixed javascript

please help

Thanks

replies.body: Regardless of the version you're using, your network needs to reach our patching servers to grab updates but something is blocking that from happening.  In addition to the steps you've tried, I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection to our servers.  Let me know if that helps.
